name: Pota-Toss - Amazing Indie iOS game with GPS-based levels!
blurb: A new artillery game with location based levels! Now with the chance to be free with our $25K stretch goal!

rewards.reward: Our sincere thanks, always and forever for supporting our idea. Also, you\u2019ll be featured on the \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d section of our website. Plus, we\u2019ll send you exclusive updates on the art of the game.
Wow! The reward above, plus a free, FULL version of the game, once it hits the App Store. You'll also have access to an exclusive set of Pota-Toss digital wallpapers, in full HD!
You\u2019ll get the above rewards, plus an exclusive game postcard shipped straight to your home, signed by the development team. Does it get any better than this? Keep reading!

Now THIS is amazing!! Remember that Postcard on the $10 reward?? Well, we are going to do a virtual tour of Saborstudio over video call (Skype or Facetime), sign the postcard while you watch, and then send it over to you! Ain't that cute? Plus all of the rewards above, of course!

All of the above PLUS, become a BETA tester! Yeah you heard it! You\u2019ll have access to the beta version of the game, weeks before it hits the app store, so that you can help us test it before the official launch.
- Nooo waay! A free version of every other game we develop EVER! So you\u2019ll get all of the above, plus one free download for every other game that Saborstudio publishes in the App Store, EVER!

All rewards on the $1-$50 range plus an AWESOME Pota-Toss T-Shirt similar to the ones showing up in the video, shipped straight to your home! (shipping to the Americas included, please add $20 for overseas shipping)

- Get Potato-ed. Amazing! We\u2019ll create a potato version of you (or whoever you want), that will be FEATURED IN THE GAME!! Yes, now THAT is AWESOME! We'll also send a print of your Potato-self, hanging around on a Pota-Toss styled version of your hometown. AND you will be featured on the game credits!! Plus, all of the rewards above and to make it better, the shirt will have your very own Pota-to printed on it!

Amazing designer package! You get all of the above, AND you\u2019ll get to work with us in designing the look for your area. Amazing! You\u2019ll have the chance to work directly with our development team, so that we can create an exclusive look for your geographic area, which will have YOUR name on it in the game. AND, you\u2019ll be featured as part of the designer team on the game credits!

You get all of the above, PLUS an incredible, delicious, perfect and amazing dinner with our production team, at a fancy restaurant in town (Costa Rica, that is)! (No Potatoes will be harmed in the cooking of the meal, transport to the location is not included).

Sponsor a level! Amazing!! For one whole year one of the levels in Pota-Toss, (that corresponds to your company location), will have a "Highway Banner" in the style of the game, with a picture of your company's logo, and the URL for its website!! Is there a better place for advertisement that a level in the so-called "Next Angry Birds"? (Plus all the rewards above)

Sponsor a Spud!! Your name, logo or company name will have its own spud (one of the bad potatoes in the game)  for one whole year after the game is released!   If your logo allows it, we'll create one based on its shape, otherwise, we'll 'stamp' it on one of our own. You get all of the rewards above, of course!!

Sponsor a Pota-to! Incredible! Your name, logo or company name will have its own potato for one year after the game launches! If your logo allows it, we'll create a potato based on its shape, otherwise, we'll 'stamp' a potato with it. Can you find a better place for advertisement than the next-best-thing on the App Store? Don\u2019t think so! Plus, all of the rewards above!

Your brand's level!! We'll create a Special Unlockable Level on the game!! The level will be based on the colors and shape of your brand, and it will have a big banner in the sky, using our "hanging clouds". Plus, of course, all of the rewards above (Except the Sponsored Pota-toes and Spuds)

Sponsor a Pota-to Power up!  Yeah you heard it!  We will invent a power up based on the features of your company (sort of like McDonald's Fries or frozen chips) that will be available on the game for 6 months after the release. Players will love to use them to get an advantage on their opponents!! Plus, all the rewards above! (except the $750 and $1000 rewards)!!
